recipesJson.name: I C CHEW-IT
recipesJson.author: Nickevz
recipesJson.description:
Vanilla Ice Cream flavoured taffy from the UK that goes by the name “Chewitts”

Requested by Darren clement and Jamie Gordon and probably a few others :)

This was fairly simple and all came down to using the correct vanilla for the job and that was INW shisha and layered with VTA ice cream it fits the bill fairly well, the taffy flavour comes from using CAP jelly candy and FLV cotton candy and CANNOT be swapped out for another cotton candy concentrate, vanilla marshmallow aids the mouthfeel and boosts the vanilla...

Good Straight off the bat, a very accurate representation of ice cream chewits, sweetener is subjective and using it higher may hinder the spun sugar flavour that FLV cotton candy gives but if that’s your thing and you need to use it higher then go right ahead :)
